name: download(_:decideDestinationUsing:suggestedFilename:completionHandler:)
desc: Asks the delegate to provide a file destination where the system should write the download data.Required.
declaration:
func download(_ download: WKDownload, 
decideDestinationUsing response: URLResponse, 
suggestedFilename: String, 
completionHandler: @escaping (URL?) -> Void)
